rooms.name: Open Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious contemporary living space with floor-to-ceiling windows that maximize natural light. Includes an adjoining dining area designed for joint family gatherings.
rooms.vastu_orientation: East side preferred to align energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A generously sized master bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east façade for optimal morning light, a private ensuite bathroom, and ample storage. Designed according to Vastu principles with north-east positioning.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom designed for joint family visitors, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to capture natural light. Includes built-in storage and a small adjoining bathroom.

rooms.name: Kids' Bedroom
rooms.description: A bright, cheerful room for children with ample natural light provided by floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side. Features built-in storage and a dedicated play area.

rooms.name: Joint Family Room
rooms.description: A multipurpose space that can serve as a communal living area or home office for extended family members. Designed with flexible seating and storage.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, open kitchen integrated into the dining space with high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows along the south façade to avoid harsh sunlight while still ensuring ample light. Designed following Vastu principles with a north-west orientation.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A functional area for appliances and storage, located conveniently near the kitchen to streamline daily tasks.

openings.location: Floor-to-ceiling windows on all façades facing east and south to maximize natural light and ventilation.
openings.description: Energy-efficient double-glazed windows that enhance insulation while allowing ample daylight.

openings.location: Main entrance at the front, with a secondary entry near the courtyard for ease of movement within the townhouse.
openings.description: Modern sliding glass doors to provide seamless indoor-outdoor transitions and maintain privacy.

openings.location: Central access point leading to an internal courtyard that acts as a private communal outdoor space with integrated seating areas and vegetation.
openings.description: The courtyard is designed to promote natural ventilation, light penetration into adjacent rooms, and serves as a focal point for family gatherings.

openings.location: Adjacent to the courtyard in an enclosed glass-enclosed area that maintains privacy while allowing views of the pool from within the living spaces.
openings.description: A semi-outdoor swimming pool integrated with landscaped surroundings and climate-controlled elements for year-round use.
